title: Super Tuesday Results, Coronavirus Funding
itunes:title: Super Tuesday Results, Coronavirus Funding
description:
Guest panel: Brendan Buck, Partner at Seven Letter and Former Spokesman & Advisor to House Speaker Paul Ryan and Doug Thornell, Partner & Head of SKDKPolitical at SKDKnickerbocker, and former lead media strategist to the DNC.


Kevin also spoke to Michael Regan, Bloomberg Senior Markets Editor about today’s stock market news.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
